channel.title: biolinguistics on Patrick C. Trettenbrein
channel.description: Recent content in biolinguistics on Patrick C. Trettenbrein

item.title: 50 Years Later: A Tribute to Eric Lenneberg’s Biological Foundations of Language
item.description: Print version of the Biolinguistics special issue celebrating the 50-year anniversary of the publication of Eric Lenneberg’s Biological Foundations of Language. Der Druck dieser Publikation wurde vom Referat für Wissenschaft & Forschung der Steiermarkischen Landesregierung gefördert.

item.title: 50 Years Later: A Tribute to Eric Lenneberg’s Biological Foundations of Language
item.description: Editorial for the Biolinguistics special issue celebrating the 50-year anniversary of the publication of Eric Lenneberg’s Biological Foundations of Language.

item.title: 50 years later: A conversation about the biological study of language with Noam Chomsky
item.description: An interview with Noam Chomsky, a co-founder of the field of biolinguistics, contemporary, and friend of Eric Lenneberg where he talks about the early days of the field, his work and relation with Lenneberg, and a number of other questions and scientific issues that (still) captivate us 50 years later.

item.title: This time in linguistics history: A 50th anniversary tribute to Eric H. Lenneberg’s Biological Foundations of Language
